query: Missing client in pricing configurator
resolution:
To add a missing client to the pricing configurator:

1. Create an opportunity in Cortex for the client account
2. Navigate to the 'Resources & Pricing' tab when the opportunity reaches 'Mobilizing to Propose' or 'Closing' stage
3. Click 'Create Pricing Proposal' to automatically send the client to the pricing configurator
4. In the configurator, add resources to the pricing quote, save, and click 'Update Cortex'
5. In Cortex, click for approval and either self-approve or send for approval

[ACTION_LINK:Open Cortex|https://bain4.lightning.force.com]

query: Please unlink cortex-pricing opportunity
resolution:
To unlink or review a Cortex-Pricing opportunity connection:

1. Review the pricing scenario data for the opportunity
2. Confirm that the information appears valid
3. Open and review both the Cortex opportunity and pricing scenario links
4. If unlinking is required, this action needs admin intervention

[ACTION_LINK:Review Opportunity|https://bain4.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Opportunity]
[ACTION_LINK:Open Pricing Scenario|https://pricing.bain.com/opportunities]

query: Partner Error when Accessing a PC linked in Cortex
resolution:
When encountering a Partner Error accessing a PC linked opportunity:

1. Please refer to the troubleshooting guide for PC linked opportunities
2. Clear your browser cache and try again
3. Ensure you have the correct permissions for the opportunity

[ACTION_LINK:View Troubleshooting Guide|https://bain.sharepoint.com/pricing-troubleshooting]

query: Not able to Add teamlet to my opportunity
resolution:
To resolve issues adding a teamlet to an opportunity:

1. Verify you have the required Salesforce access and opportunity edit permissions
2. Confirm that the Opportunity is in a stage where teamlet additions are allowed
3. Check that the Teamlet feature is enabled for your office/region
4. Clear browser cache and refresh the Cortex session
5. Navigate to Opportunity → Related Tab → Teamlet section → New

[ACTION_LINK:Open Cortex Opportunity|https://bain4.lightning.force.com]

query: Not able to add a resource to my opportunity
resolution:
To resolve issues adding a resource to an opportunity:

1. Confirm you have appropriate Cortex permissions to edit the Opportunity
2. Verify the Opportunity is in an editable stage (not locked or closed)
3. Check that required fields (staffing region, dates, role type) are completed
4. Ensure the resource is active and available for the specified project dates
5. Navigate to Opportunity → Related Tab → Resources → Add Resource

[ACTION_LINK:Open Cortex Opportunity|https://bain4.lightning.force.com]

query: OH not getting approve access
resolution:
To resolve Office Head approval access issues:

1. Confirm your Salesforce/Cortex role includes the necessary approval permissions for your office
2. Verify you are mapped as the approver in the appropriate workflow for the office and opportunity type
3. If the approval role or workflow mapping appears incorrect, request an update from your system admin
4. Log out and log back into Salesforce/Cortex after permissions are updated
5. Recheck the Approvals section to confirm access

[ACTION_LINK:Check Approval Settings|https://bain4.lightning.force.com/lightning/o/Opportunity/list]

query: Getting incorrect rates for a resource
resolution:
To update incorrect resource rates:

1. Open the opportunity in the Pricing Configurator
2. Locate the resource with incorrect rates
3. Click on 'Update Rates' to refresh the rates from the master data
4. Save the changes and sync with Cortex

[ACTION_LINK:Update Rates|https://pricing.bain.com/update-rates|TOOL_CALL:updateResourceRates]
